title.value: Bar, Timming belt placer 4, Testing conveyor

organization.source_text: Averna INATIONAL VN: Lot 1.3-1, D1 Streat, District 9 Saigon High Tech Park - HCMC (84) 28 3796 2388

notes.value: THIS DRAWING REFERENCES SUPPLIED 3D MODEL UNDIMENSIONED FEATURES ON PART TO MATCH SO MODEL TO TOLERANCE BLOCK
notes.source_text: THIS DRAWING REFERENCES SUPPLIED 3D MODEL UNDIMENSIONED FEATURES ON PART TO MATCH SO MODEL TO TOLERANCE BLOCK

notes.value: DIMENSIONS ARE IN MILLIMETERS. DIMENSIONS APPLY AFTER FINISH. ALL THREADED HOLES MUST NOT BE AFFECTED BY PAINTING SURFACE
notes.source_text: DIMENSIONS ARE IN MILLIMETERS. DIMENSIONS APPLY AFTER FINISH. ALL THREAED HOLES MUST NOT BE AFFECTED BY PAINTING SURFACE

notes.value: USE MINIMUM BEND RADIUS AND RELIEFS
notes.source_text: USE MINIMUM BEND RADIUS AND RELIEFS

notes.value: BREAK AND DEBURR ALL SHARP CORNERS AND EDGES
notes.source_text: BREAK AND DEBURRAIL SHARP CORNERS AND EDGES

notes.value: INSTALL HELICAL COIL INSERTS, PRESS FIT STANDOFFS, STUDS, AND NUTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH
notes.source_text: INSTAIL HELICAL COIL INSERTS, PRESS FIT STANDOFFS, STUDS, AND NUTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH

notes.value: ALL SURFACES SHOULD BE CLEAN AND FREE OF GREASE, GRIME, DIRT, SCRATCHES, OR BLEMISHES
notes.source_text: ALL SURFACES SHOULD BE CLEAN AND FREE OF GREASE, GRIME, DIRT, SCRATCHES, OR BLEMISHES

notes.value: IN CASE OF CONFLICT TOLERANCE ANNOTATION FOR SAME DIMENSION, APPLY TIGHTER TOLERANCE
notes.source_text: IN CASE OF CONFLICT TOLERANCE ANOTATION FOR SAME DIMENSION, APPLY TIGHTER TOLERANCE

notes.value: ENGRAVE WITH PART NUMBER, REVISION AND VENDOR CODE IN LEGIBLE SIZE AND FONT APPROXIMATELY WHERE SHOWN, (METHOD OPTIONAL)
notes.source_text: ENGRAVE WITH PART NUMBER, REVISION AND VENDOR CODE IN LEGIBLE SIZE AND FONT APPROXIMATELY WHERE SHOWN, (METHOD OPTIONAL)

notes.value: ENGRAVE ARROW & TEXT APPROXIMATELY WHERE SHOWN. (METHOD OPTIONAL)
notes.source_text: ENGRAVE ARROW & TEXT APPROXIMATELY WHERE SHOWN. (METHOD OPTIONAL)

raw_text_all: THIS DRAWING REFERENCES SUPPLIED 3D MODEL UNDIMENSIONED FEATURES ON PART TO
MATCH SO MODEL TO TOLERANCE BLOCK
DIMENSIONS ARE IN MILLIMETERS. DIMENSIONS APPLY AFTER FINISH. ALL THREAED HOLES MUST
USE MINIMUM BEND RADIUS AND RELIEFS
BREAK AND DEBURRAIL SHARP CORNERS AND EDGES
INSTAIL HELICAL COIL INSERTS, PRESS FIT STANDOFFS, STUDS, AND NUTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH
ALL SURFACES SHOULD BE CLEAN AND FREE OF GREASE, GRIME, DIRT, SCRATCHES, OR
Bar, Timming belt placer 4, Testing conveyor
IN CASE OF CONFLICT TOLERANCE ANOTATION FOR SAME DIMENSION, APPLY TIGHTER
ENGRAVE WITH PART NUMBER, REVISION AND VENDOR CODE IN LEGIBLE SIZE AND FONT
ENGRAVE ARROW 8 TEXT APPROXIMATELY WHERE SHOWN. (METHOD OPTIONAL)
